name: Behaivior
description:
Behaivior's Recovery(tm) platform uses AI and wearables to predict high-risk events and enable proactive, personalized recovery interventions. 
 Behaivior revolutionizes healthcare and well-being, making support accessible and reducing healthcare costs. Our award-winning platform, Recovery(tm), enhances patient engagement and outcomes, supports crisis intervention, and eases staff burden. We ensure our solutions reach everyone, seamlessly integrating into current care ecosystems.
one_liner:
Behaivior's Recovery(tm) platform uses AI and wearables to predict high-risk events and enable proactive, personalized recovery interventions. 
 Behaivior revolutionizes healthcare and well-being, making support accessible and reducing healthcare costs. Our award-winning platform, Recovery(tm), enhances patient engagement and outcomes, supports crisis intervention, and eases staff burden. We ensure our solutions reach everyone, seamlessly integrating into current care ecosystems.
